snippet: The Central Intelligence Agency and the Senate Intelligence Committee had accused each other of criminal behavior related to the committee’s investigation of the agency’s interrogations.
abstract: Justice Department declines to pursue dueling claims by Central Intelligence Agency and Senate Intelligence Committee, which had accused each other of criminal behavior related to the committee’s investigation of the agency’s interrogation practices during the Bush administration.
lead_paragraph: The Central Intelligence Agency and the Senate Intelligence Committee had accused each other of criminal behavior related to the committee’s investigation of the agency’s interrogations.

headline.main: Justice Dept. Declines to Investigate C.I.A. Review
headline.print_headline: Justice Dept. Declines to Investigate C.I.A. Review
